'''Staddle''' was a village in [[Bree-land]].<ref name="Sign">{{FR|Sign}}, p. 149</ref> It was located on the gentler south-eastern slopes of [[Bree-hill]].<ref name="Knife">{{FR|Knife}}, p. 181</ref> Staddle was the main settlement of the [[Bree-hobbits]].<ref name="Sign" /> Pipe-weed grew on the south slopes of Bree-hill.<ref>{{FR|Pipeweed}}, p. 8</ref>

==History==
On [[29 September]] {{TA|3018}},<ref>{{App|Great}}, entry for the year 3018, September 29, p. 1091</ref> there were some hobbits of the the [[Underhill Family]] from Staddle in ''[[The Prancing Pony]]'' in [[Bree]]. That night [[Frodo Baggins]], [[Samwise Gamgee]], [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Peregrin Took]] arrived at the inn and Frodo introduced himself as "[[Mr. Underhill]]" to [[Barliman Butterbur]], the innkeeper. When Barliman introduced "Mr. Underhill" to the other guests in the common-room, he attracted their interest.<ref>{{FR|Sign}}, pp. 153-6</ref>

Frodo and his companions left with [[Aragorn|Strider]] the [[30 September|next morning]]<ref>{{App|Great}}, entry for the year 3018, September 30, p. 1091</ref> and most of the inhabitants from Staddle were crowded on the road in Bree to watch their departure.<ref>{{FR|Knife}}, p. 180</ref> Having walked for some miles on the [[East Road]], Aragorn and the [[Hobbits]] could see later the houses and [[hobbit-holes]] north of the East Road on the south-eastern slopes of Bree-hill.<ref name="Knife" />

Bree was raided early in {{TA|3019}} by [[ruffians]] from the south during the [[War of the Ring]]. Three Men and two Hobbits from Bree-land, among them an Underhill from Staddle, were killed.<ref name="Homeward">{{RK|Homeward}}, p. 992</ref>

==Etymology==
The name ''Staddle'' is a dialectical English name, which is derived from [[Old English]] ''stathol'' (''sta√∞ol''), which means "foundation" (of buildings, sheds, ricks, etc.) and occurs in real-life English place-names.<ref>{{HM|N}}, entry '''Staddle''', p. 776</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Staddle is located directly east of Bree-town and is populated almost exclusively by hobbits.
